w ./test/sails.obj

w ./test/wooden.obj

/l a .05 .05 .05

t -500 -500 -150 500 -500 -150 -500 500 -150   
t -500 500 -150 500 -500 -150 500 500 -150 

m 0 .1 .2 .5 .5 .5 100 .1 .2 .3
t -500 1.0 -500 -500 1.0 500 500 1.0 500

l p 0 100 100 1 1 1
